The International School of Moscow Part of The British Schools Group
Dear parents,
Please find the schedules for the Parent and Teacher consultations in the links below. Please be advised that the date for the second part of PTC's will take place on the 10th of October, 2013.

Kind regards,
Magomet Gamurziev Lower Campus Front Desk Secretary
The International School of Moscow World Class Education
